titleStmt.title: Here after foloweth the newe pryuyleges and indulge[n]ces graunted by our holy Father the Pope Leo.x. to the house of seynt Thomas of Acres in London
titleStmt.author: St. Thomas's Hospital (London, England)
Catholic Church. aut

notesStmt.note: List of indulgences granted to the confraternity--STC.
Identified as STC 15474 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect: torn through middle, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
